ML_TI_DOC.TI_TEXT: EBGU - Projekt om fast affald i Lviv
EBWE - Festabfallprojekt in Lwiw
EBRD - Lviv Solid Waste Project
BERD - Proyecto relativo a los residuos sólidos de Lviv

TI_DOC.P: EBGU - Projekt om fast affald i Lviv (UA-Lviv)

CONTENTS.P: Project name: Lviv Solid Waste Project
Country: Ukraine
Business sector: Municipal and environmental infrastructure
Project ID: 49437
Funding source: EBRD
Type of contract: Project goods, works and services
Type of notice: General procurement notice
Issue date: 1.3.2018
Closing date: 1.3.2019
This is an update of the original notice published on 1.9.2017. Please note the amended list of Project components and timing of tendering.

Lviv City Municipality (City) and Lviv Communal Enterprise “Green City”, a municipal company in the City of Lviv, have applied for a loan from the European Bank for Reconstruction and Development (the Bank or EBRD) to finance the first phase of the rehabilitation of Hrybovychi landfill and introduction of sorting and composting facilities in Lviv. The proposed project, which has an estimated value of up to 35 000 000 EUR will require the procurement of the following goods, works and services to be financed from the proceeds of the Bank’s loan:
— rehabilitation of Hrybovychi landfill,
— supply and installation of the leachate treatment facilities for Hrybovychi landfill with leachate throughput capacities up to 250 m3/day,
— construction of waste mechanical and biological treatment facilities,
— development of the household civic amenity centres.
The tendering for the above contracts is expected to commence in Q1 2018.

Contracts that are to be financed with the proceeds of a loan from the Bank are subject to the EBRD Procurement Policies and Rules and are open to firms from any country. The proceeds of the Bank's loan will not be used for the purpose of any payment to persons or entities, or for any import of goods, if such payment or import is prohibited by a decision of the United Nations Security Council taken under Chapter VII of the Charter of the United Nations or under a law of official regulation of the Purchaser's country.
Interested suppliers and contractors should register interest with:
Contact Details:

ADDRESS_NOT_STRUCT.BLK_BTX: , Head of MSW Project Group, Address: 1, Rynok Sq;

CONTENTS.P: ** Companies that have already registered their interest in response to the original notice are not required to do so again.

— rehabilitation of Hrybovychi landfill,

— construction of waste mechanical and biological treatment facilities,
— development of the household civic amenity centres.
The tendering for the above contracts is expected to commence in Q1 2018.

Contracts that are to be financed with the proceeds of a loan from the Bank are subject to the EBRD Procurement Policies and Rules and are open to firms from any country. The proceeds of the Bank's loan will not be used for the purpose of any payment to persons or entities, or for any import of goods, if such payment or import is prohibited by a decision of the United Nations Security Council taken under Chapter VII of the Charter of the United Nations or under a law of official regulation of the Purchaser's country.
Interested suppliers and contractors should register interest with:
Contact Details:

ADDRESS_NOT_STRUCT.BLK_BTX: , Head of MSW Project Group, Address: 1, Rynok Sq;
